mapper.sql: ORDERDID, ORDERDORDERM, ORDERDCODE, ORDERDTYPE, ORDERDNAME, ORDERDDETAIL, ORDERDUNITS, ORDERDPRICE, ORDERDUNIT, ORDERDCLASS, ORDERDNUM, ORDERDMONEY, ORDERDRIGHTMONEY,ORDERDWEIGHT, ORDERDGOODS,ORDERDNOTE
mapper.select: select od.orderdid,od.orderdcode,od.orderdunits,om.ordermcompany from orderd od left join orderm om on od.orderdorderm = om.ordermid where od.ORDERDTYPE='商品' and od.ORDERDGOODS is null and om.ordermcompany is not null

select * from (select A.*, ROWNUM RN from ( select sum(od.orderdnum) odgoodsnum, od.orderdcode, od.orderdtype from orderd od left join orderm om on om.ordermid = od.orderdorderm left join company cp on om.ordermcompany = cp.companyid left join city ct on ct.cityid = cp.companycity where om.ordermtime >= #{staTime} and om.ordermtime <= #{endTime} and ct.cityname = #{cityname} group by od.orderdcode,od.orderdtype order by odgoodsnum desc ) A where ROWNUM <= (1*10) ) where RN > ((1-1)*10)
mapper.insert:
insert into ORDERD
ORDERDID,
ORDERDORDERM,
ORDERDCODE,
ORDERDTYPE,
ORDERDNAME,
ORDERDDETAIL,
ORDERDUNITS,
ORDERDPRICE,
ORDERDUNIT,
ORDERDCLASS,
ORDERDNUM,
ORDERDMONEY,
ORDERDRIGHTMONEY,
ORDERDWEIGHT,
ORDERDGOODS,
ORDERDNOTE,
#{orderdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdorderm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderddetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdprice,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{orderdunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderdnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{orderdmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{orderdrightmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{orderdweight,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{orderdgoods,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{orderdnote,jdbcType=FLOAT},
mapper.update:
update ORDERD
ORDERDORDERM = #{orderdorderm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDCODE = #{orderdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDTYPE = #{orderdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDNAME = #{orderdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDDETAIL = #{orderddetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDUNITS = #{orderdunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDPRICE = #{orderdprice,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDUNIT = #{orderdunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDCLASS = #{orderdclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDNUM = #{orderdnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDERDMONEY = #{orderdmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDRIGHTMONEY = #{orderdrightmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDWEIGHT = #{orderdweight,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDGOODS = #{orderdgoods,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDNOTE = #{orderdnote,jdbcType=FLOAT},
where ORDERDID = #{orderdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
